body.p: The University of Virginia (UVA) is a prestigious public university located in Charlottesville, Virginia.

section.title: Student Population
section.p: As of 2023, UVA has a student population of approximately 25,000, including undergraduate and graduate students.

section.title: Popular Majors and Degrees
section.p: Popular majors include Economics, Biology, Commerce, and Political Science. UVA is also known for its distinguished Law and Business schools.

section.title: Location
section.p: Located in Charlottesville, Virginia, the campus is known for its historic architecture, including the Rotunda, designed by Thomas Jefferson.

section.title: Mascot
section.p: The mascot of UVA is "Cavalier," representing the universityâ€™s sports teams, known as the Virginia Cavaliers.

section.title: Additional Information
section.p: UVA is a member of the prestigious Association of American Universities and is ranked among the top public universities in the nation.
